content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a cause that took place in antwerp the case involves a spouse seeking compensation for joint property the judge considered evidence such as documented gifts and deposits in shared accounts to support the spouses claims premarital funds were recognized as eligible for compensation if they were used for common purposes the judge examined the evidence provided by both parties and made rulings on various contentious issues taking into account relevant legal statutes the burden of proof was on the spouse claiming compensation who needed to provide specific documents the decision was rendered on september 28 2021 the parties involved in the case were mrs nc as the appellant and mr omiss the case is a divorce case and the court has appointed an expert to value the immovable property the wife is seeking compensation for joint property and rental income while the husband is seeking to dismiss the appeal and make additional claims the court has ordered the production of certain documents and has ruled on various financial matters including the division of property and reimbursement accounts
